name: Kai Pad Makauted
author: Madhur Jaffrey
source: A Taste Of The Far East, pg.25
ingredients:
• 2 tbsp vegetable oil

  • 3 dried red chillies

  • 2 cloves garlic, chopped

  • 1 tbsp shrimp paste

  • 450g boneless chicken thighs, sliced

  • 1 tsp paprika


  • 200g tomatoes, sliced

  • 100g mushooms, sliced

  • 15g basil, sliced

  • 2 tbsp fish sauce
instructions:
• Heat the oil in a wok or large fying pan over highish heat

  • When hot, put in the red chillies and garlic

  • Stir once or twice and put in the shrimp paste

  • Stir that for 10 seconds, breaking it up, and put in the chicken

  • Stir and fry the chicken intil it is lightly browned, put in the paprika and stir

  • Add the tomatoes, mushrooms, basil and fish sauce, stir for 1 minute.

  • Turn the heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.

  • Serve with rice or on a jacket potato!
